name: Campaign Eckmuhl
summary: The historical battles of Abensburg, Eckmuhl, Teugn-Hausen, and others are covered in this game. Using a Napoleonic tactical game system, this game has both individual battles and a campaign game. It includes a Campaign and Scenario Editor that allow the user to create their own battles and campaigns.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 售价: $49.95
